c = EmuChunk()

result = c.var()
current = c.var()

left = c.label()
right = c.label()
operation = c.label()
clear = c.label()

add = c.label()
sub = c.label()
mul = c.label()
div = c.label()

start = c.label()
c.print("cur ", current, "\nres ", result)
c.flush()
loop = c.label()
c.jump(left, [240])
c.jump(right, [241])
c.jump(operation, [242])
c.jump(clear, [243])
c.jump(loop, c.TRUE)

c.label(left)
c.math(1, current, 1, current)
c.set([240], 0)
c.jump(start, c.TRUE)

c.label(right)
c.math(0, current, 1, current)
c.set([241], 0)
c.jump(start, c.TRUE)

c.label(clear)
c.set(result, 0)
c.set(current, 0)
c.set([243], 0)
c.jump(start, c.TRUE)

c.label(operation)
c.set([242], 0)
c.print(1, " add\n", 2, " sub\n", 3, " mul\n", 4, " div\n")
c.flush()
loop1 = c.label()
c.jump(add, [240])
c.jump(sub, [241])
c.jump(mul, [242])
c.jump(div, [243])
c.jump(loop1, c.TRUE)

c.label(add)
c.math(0, result, current, result)
c.set([240], 0)
c.jump(start, c.TRUE)

c.label(sub)
c.math(1, result, current, result)
c.set([241], 0)
c.jump(start, c.TRUE)

c.label(mul)
c.math(2, result, current, result)
c.set([242], 0)
c.jump(start, c.TRUE)

c.label(div)
c.math(3, result, current, result)
c.set([243], 0)
c.jump(start, c.TRUE)

c.compile()
